summary: Bitcoin mining stocks were higher on Wednesday.
title: Bitcoin mining report: Feb. 15
content: Bitcoin mining stocks tracked by The Block were higher on Wednesday, with 18 gaining and one declining.
Bitcoin rose 8.6% to $24,070 by market close.
